pageProduct.name: Sustagen Sport Chocolate 900g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SUSTAGEN Sport is a high protein specially formulated nutrition supplement. Designed to fuel your body before exercise or to assist with recovery after training sessions, plus it provides key electrolytes sodium and potassium to help with rehydration.

SUSTAGEN Sport is low in fat# and designed to meet both the nutrition and hydration demands of exercise. Simply mix with water for:
- 15g of protein to help support lean muscle mass and aid tissue repair.
- 17 key vitamins and minerals: including 50%* RDI† of iron to help support energy production and help reduce fatigue.
- Electrolytes (such as sodium and potassium) to help support rehydration after exercise.
- Carbohydrates, a key energy source during exercise and assists recovery.
- Low GI# for sustained energy.

SUSTAGEN Sport comes in two great flavours:
-  Chocolate flavour
-  Vanilla flavour

# When made up with water. Glycemic Index = 36 (Chocolate flavour), 37 (Vanilla flavour)
* Percentage daily intakes are based on the average adult diet of 8700 kJ. Your daily intakes

may be higher or lower depending on your energy needs. †RDI: Recommended Dietary Intake.

SUSTAGEN Sport is a Formulated Supplementary Sports Food which must be consumed in conjunction with a nutritious diet, not as a sole source of nutrition and should be used in conjunction with an appropriate physical training or exercise program. Not suitable for children under 15 years of age or pregnant women. Should only be used under medical or dietetic supervision.

Product Claims: Glycemic Index - ® of GI Symbol Reg. Trademark of Glycemic Index Foundation. The GI is a ranking of carbohydrates according to their effect on blood glucose levels, Low in fat, 17 Vitamins and Minerals, 15g protein, Low GI= 36

Size: 900g

Flavour: Chocolate

Serving Size: 60g

Servings Per Pack: 15

Warnings

NOT SUTABLE FOR CHILDRN UNDER 15 YEARS OF AGE OR PREGNANT WOMEN: SHOULD ONLY BE USED UNDER MEDICAL OR DIETETIC SUPERVISION.

Not suitable for children under 15 years of age or pregnant women: Should only be used under medical or dietetic supervision

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Good to remember
Sustagen sport is a delicious low fat, nutritious supplement suitable for all types of athletes to drink before or after training sessions. Sustagen Sport porvides protein necessary for tissue building and repair, and carbyhydrate as an energy source for exercising muscles when consumed as part of a healthy diet containing a variety of foods.

Good to know
Formulated Supplementary Sports Food can assist where dietary intakes of nutrients and energy may not be adequate. The food is not a sole source of nutrition and should be consumed in conjunction with a nutritious diet. Recommend consumption: 1 serve daily in conjunction with an appropriate physical training or exercise program.

Ingredients

Non Fat Milk Solids (70%), Sugar, Cocoa (5%), Maltodextrin (Corn), Whey Protein Concentrate (Milk), Minerals (Calcium Phosphate, Ferrous Sulphate, Zinc Sulphate, Potassium Iodide), Flavour, Vitamins (Sodium Ascorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Niacinamide, Thiamine Hydrochloride, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Retinyl Acetate, Folic Acid, Cyanocobalamin, Cholecalciferol).
Contains Milk

Contains: Contains Milk

Allergen Contains: Milk

Directions

To open, remove lid and foil seal. All

USAGE ADVICE

To open, remove cap and foil seal.
Mix 3 level scoops* with 200ml water or reduced fat/skim milk (depending on taste).
Stir before serving.  Great chilled or served warm.
Can be taken before exercise or within 30 minutes after exercise.
Use enclosed scoop.  * 1 x scoop of SUSTAGEN = 20g. 

Note: Do not change proportions.  Follow feeding instructions.

PREPARATION INSTRUCTIONS

Mix 3 tablespoons** with water or reduced fat/skim milk (depending on taste).
**1x tablespoon of SUSTAGEN® = 20g
Stir before serving.
Great Chilled or served warm.
Can be taken before exercise or within 30 minutes after exercise

Note: Follow feeding instructions or recommended daily consumption.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool dry place and use within 4 weeks after opening.
To open, remove lid and foil seal.
All prepared products should be tightly covered and consumed within 4 hours at room temperature or within 24 hours if refrigerated.
Powder may settle during transportation.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Recycle Can and Lid. Dispose of Foil

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
